item.title: macOS Spotlight Vulnerability Discovered by Microsoft
item.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence found a Spotlight-related vulnerability that could allow attackers to steal private file data, outlining the issue in a blog post today. Microsoft’s threat team is callin
